text: [Music]
EDF Energy are the leading producer of
low carbon electricity to the UK
providing over one-fifth of the UK's
requirements through our low carbon
nuclear generation and generation assets
EDF Energy embarked on a project called
power shift at just over a year ago
power shift is a product that allows
customers to take control of their
energy and to essentially take any
inherent flexibility that they have and
monetize that through EDF Energies
trading services but when this grid went
live we had a flip chart I made a
spreadsheet but when you've only got a
handful of power stations you can
operate like that but if I want to
replace a five hundred and megawatt coal
power station with five hundred
customers that are willing to turn down
their supply in the event of a high
price I can't use a spreadsheet to work
out all the prices of five hundred
people so instead we move to a much more
IT centric solution which is the power
shift platform and the data schema power
shift allows the customer to talk to us
and say could you only dispatch my
assets at this price or I'm only
available for flexibility between 5:00
in the evening and 7:00 in the evening
but for them to do that we need to log
on to our a w s hosted website we would
run the optimization schedule and then
that optimization schedule would then
send a signal to our customers sites to
say you can save money or even make
money on your electricity usage by not
using electricity now by having that
data schemer of the customers wishes and
the market prices we can then share back
all of the value created by helping
balance the grid at those five prices
back to the customer and then credit it
on their supply bill using AWS and we've
reduced our deployment time
significantly so for example our last
move of a code upgrade that we did from
pre-production
we've got down to I think 14 minutes
which is significantly lower than the
days it would take for us to do code
deployment changes for some of our
enterprise limited working of AWS we're
able to start the decentralization of
the UK energy market into the customer
becoming prosumers this has only really
been enabled through the digital
transformation and the move to a
cloud-based interface into our trading
desk to ensure that those customers are
able to monetize their flexibility in
this new and exciting decentralized
world
[Music]
you
